rukus.text: aqsm allah baldhr ealaa 'an bani adam lafi hlkt wnqsan. wala yajuz lileabd 'an yuqsim 'iilaa ballh, fa'iina alqism bighayr allah shrk
aqsm allah baldhr ealaa 'an bani adam lafi hlkt wnqsan. wala yajuz lileabd 'an yuqsim 'iilaa ballh, fa'iina alqism bighayr allah shrk
'ila aladhin amanuu biallah waeamiluu eamalana salhana, wa'awsaa baeduhum bedana balastmsak balhq, waleamal btaet allh, walsbr ealaa dhlk
